service-version.name: BitNami Jenkins
service-version.description:
BitNami Jenkins Service greatly simplifies the deployment of Jenkins.
Jenkins, previously known as Hudson, is an open source continuous integration server. Built with Java, it provides over 400 plugins to support building and testing virtually any project. It supports SCM tools including CVS, Subversion, Git, Mercurial, Perforce and Clearcase, and can execute Apache Ant and Apache Maven based projects as well as arbitrary shell scripts and Windows batch commands. It also can monitor executions of remote tasks.

ns6:component-version-script.script:
### BitNami Jenkins Service CONFIGURE script ###
#!/bin/bash
export PATH=$PATH:/usr/local/sbin:/usr/local/bin:/usr/sbin:/usr/bin:/sbin:/bin
cd /tmp echo "Configuring BitNami Jenkins.." echo "login: ${jenkins_user}"
./bitnami-jenkins* --mode unattended --prefix /opt/bitnami --disable-components perl,git,common --base_user ${jenkins_user} --base_password ${jenkins_password} --base_user_name "${jenkins_user_name}" --base_mail ${jenkins_mail}
rm bitnami-jenkins*
echo "OK!"

meta-tag-type.name: OS Family
meta-tag-type.description: Operating System (OS) Family.

ns6:component-version-script.script:
### BitNami Jenkins Service INSTALL script ###
export PATH=$PATH:/usr/local/sbin:/usr/local/bin:/usr/sbin:/usr/bin:/sbin:/bin
APP_NAME=jenkins APP_VERSION=1.483-0
if [ -x /usr/sbin/setenforce ]; then /usr/sbin/setenforce 0 fi
echo "Downloading BitNami packages.." platform=`uname -m`
cd /tmp
if [ $platform == "i686" ]; then echo "32 bit" wget ${download_url}/bitnami-$APP_NAME-$APP_VERSION-linux-installer.run else echo "64 bit" wget ${download_url}/bitnami-$APP_NAME-$APP_VERSION-linux-x64-installer.run fi
chmod 755 bitnami-*
echo "OK!"
